doc.previous: which surrounds the body represents the union of two unconnected surfaces
doc.after: Equation ref ta1 can be decomposed into two surface integrals yielding The right hand side integral in Eq ref ta2 represents the reaction forces of the airplane The left hand side integral in Eq ref ta2 represents the total force exerted by the fluid Mathematically these two integrals are equivalent However the numerical integration of these terms will hardly lead to the same result because the solution is approximated In the terminology of Computational Fluid Dynamics CFD when the integration is performed using the left hand side integral in Eq ref ta2 the near field method is employed On the other hand when the integration of the right hand side in Eq ref ta2 is computed the far field method is considered
